on what bedbugs look like, and how to inspect and sanitize belongings. Many people just want to discard all luggage and clothing after discovering an infestation, but Kells and Jeff Hahn say this is unnecessary. The key is to contain all items suspected of carrying bed bugs in plastic bags until the items can be laundered, washed by hand, heated, or frozen, they advise.
